messages.title: 60 SECOND Q&A WITH LAURA SANDYS
messages.content: What will be different from the last 13 years of Labour's wasted opportunities?

messages.title: LAURA SANDYS WORKING FOR YOU
messages.content: Laura joined 'On the Beat' with our police which saw us increase police time... SUPPORTING OUR FISHERMEN who have had a bad time with fish stock and EU rules.

messages.title: A PERSONAL MESSAGE FROM DAVID CAMERON WHY WE NEED CHANGE IN BRITAIN TODAY
messages.content: Dear Resident, Thirteen years ago Labour were elected promising change... I hope you take this chance to vote for change. David Cameron

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Having looked after her father, Laura knows the sacrifice made by Carers
As a local governor she is committed to improving education for our children
Having founded two small companies, she knows the challenges of running a business

issues.health: Laura is personally committed to the NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: At the NHS she is a tribute to this country and I am dedicated to improve healthcare locally. We need to put doctors and nurses back in control, reducing bureaucracy, cutting back on distracting targets.

politicalExperience.achievements: Committed to improving education for our children

images.caption: Laura on patrol, supporting our fishermen, pubs at risk, Laura talking to public.
